altername_name: Age of Discovery IV with Power Up Kit HD Version
대항해시대 IV with 파워업 키트 HD 버전
name: Daikokai Jidai IV with Power Up Kit HD Version
overview: InUncharted Waters IV with Power-Up Kit HD Version, players will travel the Seven Seas—including the Mediterranean Sea, East Asia, New World, and more—with their own fleet in the Age of Discovery. Buy and trade while gaining shares at the harbors in each sea, and come out victorious in naval battles against adversaries with the goal of becoming the ruler of the Seven Seas.
